EmailTemplate.name: WBN-2018-09-05 PKS Live Demo.ES-2018-09-05 PKS Live Demo Invite 1 - September_we
EmailTemplate.subject: WEBINAR: The Non-Elementary Guide to Pivotal Container Service (PKS)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/pks/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Pivotal offers a faster way to build, deploy, and start managing your Kubernetes clusters on VMware and Google Cloud. But how do you start? We’ve got you covered.
Join us on September 5, 2018, at 11 am EST <[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/pks/]]> as we explore:
- What is Pivotal Container Service (PKS)
- What Pivotal Container Service (PKS) is Not
- How to Use Workload Automation for PKS (Demo)
<[[https://turbonomic.com/resources/pks/]]> We hope to see you there!
Regards, Team Turbonomic
